body.footer: Issue Type: DEFECT Summary: Color picker on Fonts preferences ignores hex value. Product: ide Version: 6.9 Platform: PC OS/Version: Linux Status: NEW Severity: normal Priority: P3 Component: UI AssignedTo: olangr@netbeans.org ReportedBy: aarjona@netbeans.org QAContact: issues@ide.netbeans.org
body.para: Steps to reproduce: * Tools->Options->Fonts&Colors. Select any category, say Method. * Click on either Foreground or Background Color. Pick Custom. * Enter a value in the hex box; for instance #CCCCCC. * After clicking OK, the value is still the original. Opening Custom again shows the old value. No changes are applied to the color theme.
